definitions.definition: A large basket or bag fastened, usually in pairs , to the back of a bicycle or pack animal , or carried in pairs over the shoulders .
A decorative basket for the display of flowers or fruits .
One of a pair of hoops used to expand the volume of a woman's skirt to either side.
A piece of basketwork for protecting archers , or, filled with gravel or sand, for forming and protecting embankments , etc.

main_definition: A large basket or bag fastened, usually in pairs , to the back of a bicycle or pack animal , or carried in pairs over the shoulders .
secondary_definitions: A decorative basket for the display of flowers or fruits .
( historical , fashion ) One of a pair of hoops used to expand the volume of a woman's skirt to either side.
( historical , military ) A piece of basketwork for protecting archers , or, filled with gravel or sand, for forming and protecting embankments , etc.
